info.task: read unchecked menuitemradio in a group in a submenu
info.title: Read unchecked menu item radio in reading mode

setupScript.name: focusonfirstlink
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link just before the menubar
setupScript.source:
// Move focus to the link just before the meunbar
testPageDocument.querySelector('a').focus();

user: Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu item with right arrow.
Navigate to 'Blue' menu item radio with down arrow.
Activate the screen reader reading cursor.
instructions.raw: Tab to 'Text Formatting' menubar. | Navigate to 'Style/Color' menu item with right arrow. | Open 'Style/Color' menu with down arrow. | Navigate to 'Blue' menu item radio with down arrow. | Activate the screen reader reading cursor. | Read the  'Blue' menu item radio
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: The role 'menu item radio' is conveyed
The position of the item and number of items in the 'Text Color' group are conveyed
The name and role of the 'Text Color' group are conveyed
